alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 13 at 11:16PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of Middle Tennessee, including the following county, Wilson. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1110 PM CDT, Heavy rainfall from thunderstorms this evening has led to minor flooding ongoing in the advisory area. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Watertown. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
